title: about the riot point, can some one tell wtf is this, pls came and have look
body: just got reply by riot in the ticket, they tell me to enter the number correctly(i purcharse a rp for like 10-20 time, how could i enter it wrong) i was like wtf, are they memeroy lost or some thing, is that means they don't know about rp system down?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please see [this announcement](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/cLeYquE0-rp-card-redemption-issue-21042016) thread regarding the recent issue with redeeming RP cards.

If after the rollback has been applied and all pending transactions finalised you are still yet to receive your RP please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will assist you further.
It all start yesterday they just told me to wait 3 dayss before i message them again due to it might just be a delay.....
we shouldn't have to wait at all...
And I agree but they are working on it it atm it on the server list that they are currently working on resolving this issues now we just have to wait and see how long it takes.
LOL i got the exact same response, they didnt even read yours or my own ticket.
